mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Caderno is a privacy-first, decentralized journaling platform dedicated to protecting personal truths and empowering those who speak truth to power.
mission.corePurposeDesc: Provide journalists, whistleblowers, survivors, and activists with a secure digital space to document experiences without fear of censorship or surveillance.
mission.feature1: Encrypted Storage: Journal entries in encrypted "pantries" on decentralized cloud you control
mission.feature2: Safety Mechanism: Optional timed alarm (dead man's switch) delivers entries to trusted contacts
mission.feature3: Federated Infrastructure: Self-hostable, putting control in the hands of the people
mission.feature4: Evidence Preservation: Safeguards protecting users from those who might silence them

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: A world where personal narratives and critical truths are preserved securely, transparently, and resiliently ‚Äî beyond the reach of any authority.
vision.sanctuaryDesc: An ethical digital sanctuary fostering transparency and resilience against oppression.
vision.empowermentDesc: Empowered individuals speak truth to power, ensuring voices cannot be erased.
vision.federationDesc: User-operated servers worldwide form a censorship-resistant network.
vision.standardDesc: Normalizing E2E encryption, decentralization, and user autonomy as defaults.

ethos.title: Ethos
ethos.description: Grounded in transparency, resilience, and empowerment, guided by privacy, security, and social accountability.
ethos.transparencyDesc: Fully open-source with no hidden backdoors. Anyone can inspect and contribute to the code.
ethos.privacyDesc: Built on E2E encryption. We don't collect or monetize personal data‚Äîperiod.
ethos.securityDesc: Decentralized architecture with no single point of failure. Robust against outages and censorship.
ethos.empowermentDesc: Self-hosting capability returns power to the people. We stand with whistleblowers and activists.
ethos.accountabilityDesc: Create immutable records that serve as evidence, ensuring truth finds a way out.

privacyTab.title: Privacy
privacyTab.description: Privacy is paramount and the foundation of our platform.
privacyTab.e2eeDesc: All entries are E2EE by default. Only you (and your intended recipients) can decrypt them‚Äînot us, not anyone.
privacyTab.federatedDesc: Choose your own server or a trusted host. No centralized data silos vulnerable to mass surveillance.
privacyTab.noTrackingDesc: We don't track, profile, or monetize your data. No advertising, no data mining‚Äîyour data serves only you.
privacyTab.userControlDesc: Export, delete, or manage your data anytime. Offline-first with optional sync. You're always in control.

security.title: Cybersecurity
security.description: Defense-in-depth strategy to protect high-risk users.
security.encryptionDesc: AES-256, E2EE for journal content, TLS 1.3 for network. Data protected at rest and in transit.
security.federatedSecurityDesc: Each server operates independently. Breach of one doesn't affect others‚Äîno single honeypot.
security.userFeaturesDesc: Multi-factor authentication, app lock, panic mode, and anti-tampering detection.
security.auditingDesc: Open-source for community review. Third-party audits. Responsible disclosure program.
security.deadManSwitchDesc: Encrypted package released to trusted contacts if user is unable to check in. Deters coercion.
security.improvementDesc: Regular updates, incident response plans, and ongoing threat monitoring.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Sustainable funding that aligns with our values‚Äînever compromising user trust.
sustainability.saasDesc: Optional managed hosting for users who prefer convenience. Software remains free and self-hostable.
sustainability.enterpriseDesc: Custom solutions, priority support, and consulting for organizations like NGOs and journalism outlets.
sustainability.donationsDesc: Community funding through platforms like Open Collective. Grants from digital rights foundations.
sustainability.neverDesc: No advertisements. No data sales. No user analytics for profit. No paywalls that hinder basic access.
sustainability.transparentFinanceDesc: Open accounting of how the project is funded. Profits reinvested into the mission.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: Modern, secure, and open-source technologies powering Caderno.
storageItems: Capable of offline operation by default
